name: Artbiogs
description: A web application that uses AI/ML to detect Artist's Exhibition details from a CV.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your AWS Access Key ID. This key must have access to S3, Textract and Comprehend

AWS_BUCKET_NAME.description: The AWS Bucket name to save static uploaded and parsed files

AWS_REGION_NAME.description: The AWS bucket location for the above bucket.
